com.zcking.furyengine.engine

Class Window

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zcking.furyengine.engine.Window

  • public class Window
extends java.lang.Object
    The main wrapper and control class for the window/display.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Window(WindowSettings settings)
      Constructs a new window instance, but does not initialize it.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Window

        public Window(WindowSettings settings)
        Constructs a new window instance, but does not initialize it.
        Parameters:
        settings - The window configuration.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        Initializes the window using the settings passed in at construction.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If GLFW has not been initialized yet (or if it fails).
        java.lang.RuntimeException - If fails to create the window.

      • update

        public void update()
        Swaps the window's buffers and polls it for events. Called by the main game engine once per frame.

      • setClearColor

        public void setClearColor(float r,
                          float g,
                          float b,
                          float alpha)
        Sets the window's clear color.
        Parameters:
        r - The red value of the clear color.
        g - The green value of the clear color.
        b - The blue value of the clear color.
        alpha - The alpha value of the clear color.

      • isKeyPressed

        public boolean isKeyPressed(int keyCode)
        Whether or not a given key was pressed.
        Parameters:
        keyCode - The key code to check for.
        Returns:
        true if the specified key was pressed; false otherwise.

      • windowShouldClose

        public boolean windowShouldClose()
        Checks if the window should close due to some window event.
        Returns:
        true if the window should close; false otherwise.
